channel.title: Photography on KevOps
channel.description: Recent content in Photography on KevOps

item.title: Foggy Forest
item.description: A foggy view of a foggy forrest, taken from my balcony with my old Canon 1000D and Sigma 18-200mm F3,5-6,3.

item.title: Fasanerie
item.description: “Fasanerie” is the name of a local wildlife and forest park. It's free to enter and a very nice place to spent a family day. All images were edited with Darktable, a free open source Adobe Lightroom alternative.

item.title: City Walk Wiesbaden
item.description: Some pictures I took while walking through the city of Wiesbaden. All images in this post were taken with my Fujifilm X30 camera.

item.title: Imbiss
item.description: Neon sign at night, taken during some festivities in Mainz, Germany.
